pages.text: al-taibuna l-ʿabiduna l-hamiduna l-saihuna l-rakiʿuna l-sajiduna l-amiruna bil-maʿrufi wal-nahuna ʿani l-munkari wal-hafizuna lihududi l-lahi wabashiri l-mu'minina
ma kana lilnnabiyyi wa-alladhina amanu an yastaghfiru lil'mush'rikina walaw kanu uli qur'ba min baʿdi ma tabayyana lahum annahum ashabu l-jahimi
wama kana is'tigh'faru ib'rahima li-abihi illa ʿan mawʿidatin waʿadaha iyyahu falamma tabayyana lahu annahu ʿaduwwun lillahi tabarra-a min'hu inna ib'rahima la-awwahun halimun
wama kana l-lahu liyudilla qawman baʿda idh hadahum hatta yubayyina lahum ma yattaquna inna l-laha bikulli shayin ʿalimun
inna l-laha lahu mul'ku l-samawati wal-ardi yuh'yi wayumitu wama lakum min duni l-lahi min waliyyin wala nasirin
laqad taba l-lahu ʿala l-nabiyi wal-muhajirina wal-ansari alladhina ittabaʿuhu fi saʿati l-ʿus'rati min baʿdi ma kada yazighu qulubu fariqin min'hum thumma taba ʿalayhim innahu bihim raufun rahimun
